Text.Page:
Our link to the Tainted Gorge is hampered by a pack of {@LinkCreature:13#300910#prowling cromoses} near the entrance.

Chione's the only airship pilot detailed to this section of the island. Until they replace her, we can only communicate via runners.

Kill the cromoses, then report to {@linkcreature:213#1025$$Sersine} down in the Tainted Gorge Outpost.

Oh good. I'm glad to hear you cleared that route up for us.

Listen, don't underestimate the island. Remember that our troops are pulling out because of unrest in the federation. It isn't because this place is suddenly safer.

Stay watchful.
